name: Cirtas Systems
overview: Cirtas solves the challenges associated with storing data in the cloud, making cloud storage work just like on-site enterprise storage arrays. Deployed in the data center, Cirtas Bluejet Cloud Storage Controllers simplify storage management and vastly reduce storage TCO for medium to large enterprises. Founded in 2008, the company is headquartered in San Jose, California and is backed by NEA, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Bessemer Venture Partners and Amazon.

funding_rounds.source_description: Cirtas Systems Closes $22.5M Series B Funding Round

milestones.description: Cirtas Unveils Bluejet Cloud Storage Controllers
